segments.text: How is everything going with your girlfriend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Didn't I tell you ? It's over !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry to hear that . I did't know that you had split up . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a few things . The first thing that happened was that we were supposed to go out for a romantic dinner for our one year anniversary , but she stood me up !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ! Did she tell you why she didn't show up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I ended up finding out later that night when I saw her drinking with another man at a club near my home !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was she thinking ? Did you confront her about it when you saw her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to , but I knew that if I spoke to her , I'd just blow up at her , so I decided to just go home . I called her later that the night , but she didn't answer the phone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe she would do that to you . It's so dishonest-and rude !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I still haven't heard from her . The good thing is that I'm so angry with her that I don't feel sad about not having her around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bet you that she regrets what she's done . You are such a good catch ! She really lost out , didn't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I don't think you'll have a problem finding another girlfriend . There are plenty of fish in the sea !
segments.speaker: S1
